verses.roman:
sei amogha haila prabhura bhakta 'ekānta'
preme nāce, kṛṣṇa-nāma laya mahā-śānta

synonyms: sei amogha—that same Amogha; haila—became; prabhura—of Lord Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; bhakta—devotee; ekānta—unflinching; preme nāce—dances in ecstasy; kṛṣṇa-nāma laya—chants the Hare Kṛṣṇa mahā-mantra; mahā-śānta—very peaceful.
translation: Thereafter, Amogha became an unalloyed devotee of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu. He danced in ecstasy and peacefully chanted the holy name of Lord Kṛṣṇa.
